adrFormatAddress: 1232 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: Let me tell you not only about this business, but this location!!! The staff are well knowledgeable, kind, meticulous and do right by their clients. I am beyond obsessive with the way I like things to be,  like my spray tans. These ladies are so beyond accommodating each and every time. They make sure I'm super satisfied throughout my services and are happy to fix anything you need!!! They are just exceptional and really go above and beyond the call of customer service!!! I will never go anywhere else!! If you have not checked them out you should run! I promise you won't be disappointed!

originalText.text: I am so glad I decided to try Sugared and Bronzed. I had previously done sugaring at another NYC salon multiple times, but felt that the facility was no longer cutting it. Sugared and Bronzed was such a needed change! The salon is comfortable and very clean, and the staff was helpful and kind. Best of all, I am thrilled with the results and have had no skin issues (and my skin is very sensitive!). I would definitely recommend this location.

text.text: I am so glad I decided to try Sugared and Bronzed. I had previously done sugaring at another NYC salon multiple times, but felt that the facility was no longer cutting it. Best of all, I am thrilled with the results and have had no skin issues (and my skin is very sensitive!). I would definitely recommend this location.

originalText.text: Just had my first ever sugaring about a couple of days and it was amazing.The staff is amazing. It was as painless as possible. It not how you get a traditional waxing  where it’s hot wax  and strips involved it was way much better then that it was one of the best experiences I ever had The lady that did my sugaring her name is Hope and she was the best she talked  me through the whole process of how it works and kept an amazing conversation. Let me take a good amount breaks that I need. This place is amazing. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Love how quick and easy the spray tan is! I’ve gone twice already and had great results. It’s not super expensive and the place is super clean and staff is quite nice. Will continue to go!

text.text: Love how quick and easy the spray tan is! I’ve gone twice already and had great results. It’s not super expensive and the place is super clean and staff is quite nice. Will continue to go!

originalText.text: I love all of the S+B locations in the city and had a particularly good experience here! I’d only ever tried the tans, but did try sugaring during my most recent visit before a trip to Miami. The tan looked amazing as usual, but my only complaint is that I ended up getting some funky tan lines that stuck to a little bit of the leftover sugar, but I would just be more careful (on my end!) next time to make sure it was all gone before doing the tan. Everyone who works here couldn’t have been nicer - and everyone is so professional and efficient. No awkwardness and you’re in and out so quickly! I mentioned the tan lines after and they were so so nice about it - I didn’t even mention it until I filled out one of their email surveys, and was so surprised when they got back to me right away. Personally feel like the amazing customer service makes it worth going here every time - wouldn’t try anywhere else!
